text: Bastian Kersaudy (born 9 June 1994) is a French badminton player from the Chambly Oise club. He has won some international tournament includes, the 2014 Brazil International in the men's doubles event partnered with Gaetan Mittelheisser, the 2015 Slovenia International in the mixed doubles event partnered with Léa Palermo, and at the 2017 Estonian International tournament in the men's doubles event partnered with Julien Maio. Kersaudy competed at the 2015 European Games in Baku, Azerbaijan. In 2018, he captured the men's doubles gold medal at the 2018 Mediterranean Games partnered with Thom Gicquel. == Achievements == === Mediterranean Games === Men's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
